channel.title: I need help understanding what i need
channel.description: I am wanting to get into makin these worlds and such as all of you do. I just don't know where to start. I don't understand if there is a java compiler i need to get started or what. Please Help me I have been off and on this site for a couple of years now. [br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 27, 2008, 12:25:34 am[/size][hr]At least point me in the right direction?

item.title: I need help understanding what i need
item.dc:creator: @thenewguy thenewguy
item.description:
@thenewguy wrote:

ok well im tryin to start a server but it wont let me log into my lynksys router. it wont let me log in with the default username and pass (admin) any ideas?

Read full topic
item.source: I need help understanding what i need

item.title: I need help understanding what i need
item.dc:creator: @Full_Metalst Full Metalst
item.description:
@Full_Metalst wrote:

Are you starting your own base from scratch? This is pretty much all you need:

[ul][li]client.java[/li]
[li]NPCHandler.java[/li]
[li]TextHandler.java[/li]
[li]autospawn.cfg[/li]
[li]shops.cfg[/li]
[li]player.java[/li]
[li]PlayerHandler.java[/li]
[li]server.java[/li]
[li]compiler.bat[/li]
[li]runserver.bat[/li][/ul]

That’s pretty much the only files you need. Also, the .class files come with the .java files.

Read full topic
item.source: I need help understanding what i need

item.description:
@Torax wrote:

item.title: I need help understanding what i need
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

[quote=“zyle1992, post:2, topic:253048”]if you have been “off and on” this site for the past few years, a few things would be true:

  1. You wouldn’t have joined today
  2. You wouldn’t call it “worlds” seriously? /epic fail
  3. You would know that you need more than a java compiler to make a server

bottom line, go into the tutorials section, look for the “How to start a server” sticky, and follow the tutorial[/quote]

Wow, you’re a smart one.

Date Registered: July 07, 2007, 04:46:44 pm Last Active: Today at 10:30:57 pm

Read full topic

item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

if you have been “off and on” this site for the past few years, a few things would be true:

  1. You wouldn’t have joined today
  2. You wouldn’t call it “worlds” seriously? /epic fail
  3. You would know that you need more than a java compiler to make a server

bottom line, go into the tutorials section, look for the “How to start a server” sticky, and follow the tutorial
